law.catch_line: If a hotel fails to pay the hotel rental tax to an authorized county, except Talbot County or Wicomi...

text.section: If a hotel fails to pay the hotel rental tax to an authorized county, except Talbot County or Wicomico County, within 1 month after the payment is due under § 9-311 of this subtitle, the hotel shall pay a tax penalty of 10% of the unpaid tax.

If a hotel fails to pay the hotel rental tax to Talbot County or Wicomico County within 120 days after the payment is due under § 9-311 of this subtitle, the hotel shall pay a tax penalty of 10% of the unpaid tax.
